h2_title: Zhu Bajie Boss Fight and Guide - Second Encounter
content: One last thing to remember is that while you may have problems dodging, the same isn't always true for your Transformation Spells. In a pinch, they can be used to give you a level of evasion your can't achieve on your own, so long as you don't act too reckless and waste your might.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Zhu_Bajie_(Boss_Fight).md', within the main section titled 'Zhu Bajie (Boss Fight)', specifically from the subsection 'Zhu Bajie Boss Fight and Guide - Second Encounter'.
The content is as follows:
One last thing to remember is that while you may have problems dodging, the same isn't always true for your Transformation Spells. In a pinch, they can be used to give you a level of evasion your can't achieve on your own, so long as you don't act too reckless and waste your might.
